alert.note: Alert for Hardy (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 21 at 10:19AM EDT until October 23 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 to 32 possible. * WHERE...In Virginia, Augusta, Rockingham, Shenandoah and Page Counties. In West Virginia, Hardy County. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
